short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a unique email address from the base email address using gmail's alias feature.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate a unique email address from the base email address using gmail's alias feature.
In developing a web service, have you ever used gmail's alias function to create an email address many times? Have you ever felt annoyed by it?

This tool will free you from that hassle.

--------------------------------
How to use

1. enter your base email and click "update".
2. click "generate"
3. click "copy"

That's all!
